alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:56PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northwestern Kent, northwestern Talbot, Queen Anne`s and Kent Counties through 445 PM EST... At 355 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong gusty winds along a cold front extending from near Aberdeen Proving Ground to near Millers Island to near Parole. Movement was east at 35 mph. A 40 mph wind gust was recently measured at the BWI Airport. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Centerville, Talbot, Smyrna, Chestertown, Centreville, Romancoke, Clayton, Rock Hall, St. Michaels, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Old Town, Grasonville, Starr, Copperville, Newtown, Morgnec and Delaney Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
